catentdesc.name: Econo Sense
catentdesc.longdescription: For the entrepreneur and the investor, Econo Sense provides in depth articles on financial matters that impact you. With editorials from some of the leading financial analysts on Wall Street, all perspectives are covered. Get Econo Sense working for you today.

catentdesc.name: Claudet
catentdesc.shortdescription: Style and lifestyle advice for the modern woman.
catentdesc.longdescription: Claudet magazine is a definitive resource on fashion and lifestyle advice. Every issue includes the latest celebrity gossip and fashion trend previews. Additionally, each month features music reviews, entertaining advice and shopping tips. First published in 2001.

catentdesc.name: Delish
catentdesc.shortdescription: Recipes, dinner party tips and restaurant reviews for the food fanatic.
catentdesc.longdescription: It's not just about food, it's about great food. The best dining out and the greatest recipes and party ideas. The hottest new chefs, the seasons best new wines and more. It's not just about food, it's about the lifestyle of great food.

catentdesc.name: Photoritz
catentdesc.shortdescription: The newest cameras, the best tips and the latest photography news.
catentdesc.longdescription: Photoritz is the photographer's complete resource for improving their skills. Every issue is filled with photography lessons and tips, reviews of the latest cameras and gear and the best new photos for inspiration. First published in 1962.

catentdesc.name: Society Time
catentdesc.longdescription: Society Time is your source for the latest news and stories that interest you, the sophisticated urbanite. Discover new restaurants, perspective on topical current events and our award winning investigative journalism. First published in 1983.

catentdesc.name: Archaeo
catentdesc.shortdescription: Architecture and design for today's fast paced world.
catentdesc.longdescription: Archaeo features profiles of the leading international designers and architects, the most ambitious and outrageous construction projects around the world and home designs of your dreams. First published in 1954.

catentdesc.name: Sportfit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sports, fitness and attitude. The best workouts and sport commentary.
catentdesc.longdescription: Sportfit is a sports and fitness magazine that lives and breathes a healthy athletic lifestyle. Featuring sports reporting on professional and amateur sports as well as an intense focus on health and fitness. Each month profiles an up and coming athlete, no holds barred sports commentary and new workouts to add to your routine. First published in 1988.

catentdesc.name: Digiglee
catentdesc.shortdescription: The latest in gadgets, electronics and software.
catentdesc.longdescription: Digiglee covers the digital heartbeat of the consumer electronics industry. All the latest tech and gadgets are reviewed, profiled and discussed in an easy to understand way. Digiglees reporters aren't afraid to tell you what is great, and what isn't! First published in 1997.

catentdesc.name: Wedding Luxe
catentdesc.shortdescription: Everything you need to know for your dream wedding.
catentdesc.longdescription: Wedding Luxe is your guide to planning the perfect wedding. Follow the latest trends in bridal parties, dresses and floral arrangements with our signature offbeat writing. Each month features a celebrity's wedding and tips to get the most out of your special day. First published in 1794.

catentdesc.name: Natura
catentdesc.shortdescription: Escape outside to find tranquility and better health.
catentdesc.longdescription: Natura is an escape from the everyday. Featuring the best nature getaways, the latest tips on a healthy vegetarian diet and yoga exercises. Be at one with nature and your body. First published in 1969.
